patthana10.13:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana10.13:2.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṃsa.
patthana10.13:4.1: Hetuyā pañcavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate pañcavīsa.
patthana10.13:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana10.13:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana10.13:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana10.13:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tiṃsa …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṃsa.
patthana10.13:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana10.13:10.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṃsa.
patthana10.13:11.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana10.13:12.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṃsa.
